mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.place AS "place", a.gender AS "gender", a.type AS "type", a.level AS "level", a.proposal AS "proposal", a.rhythm AS "rhythm"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( id, place, gender, type, level, proposal, rhythm ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{place}, #{gender}, #{type}, #{level}, #{proposal}, #{rhythm} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SET place = #{place}, gender = #{gender}, type = #{type}, level = #{level}, proposal = #{proposal}, rhythm = #{rhythm} WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
